sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormArray, FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { ICompany } from 'app/administration/employer-profile/employer-profile.model'; // import { IEnquiryCompany } from '../../model/enquiry-company.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-company-expanded-details', templateUrl: './company-expanded-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./company-expanded-details.component.scss'] }) export class CompanyExpandedDetailsComponent implements OnInit { ep: ICompany = {}; representativeList = ['CO1', 'CO2', 'EO1', 'EO2', 'SUP']; salutationOptions = [ {label: "Ms", value: "MS"}, {label: "Mr", value: "MR"}, {label: "Mrs", value: "MRS"}, {label: "Dr", value: "DR"} ] companyForm: FormGroup = this.fb.group({ companyInfo: this.fb.group({ csn1: new FormControl(''), csn2: new FormControl(''), csn3: new FormControl(''), name: new FormControl(''), blk: new FormControl(''), street: new FormControl(''), unit: new FormControl(''), building: new FormControl(''), postal: new FormControl('') }), officers: this.fb.array([]) }); directSchemeForm: FormGroup = this.fb.group({ directSchemeHistory: this.fb.array([]) }); constructor( private fb: FormBuilder ) { this.constructForm(); } get officersFormArray(): FormArray { return this.companyForm.get('officers') as FormArray; } get directSchemeFormArray(): FormArray { return this.directSchemeForm.get('directSchemeHistory') as FormArray; } ngOnInit(): void { // to do } exportCSV(): void { // to do } constructForm(): void { const officers = this.companyForm.get('officers') as FormArray; this.representativeList.forEach((role: string) => { officers.push( this.fb.group({ id: new FormControl(), officerRole: role, nric: new FormControl(''), salutation: new FormControl(''), name: new FormControl(''), appointment: new FormControl(''), email: new FormControl(''), contactNo: new FormControl('') }) ); } ); } patchFormValues(): void { this.companyForm.patchValue({ companyInfo: { csn1: this.ep.csn.substring(0, 10), csn2: this.ep.csn.substring(10, 13), csn3: this.ep.csn.substring(13, 15), name: this.ep.companyName, blk: this.ep.blk, street: this.ep.street, unit: this.ep.unit, building: this.ep.building, postal: this.ep.postalCode }, }) const tempOfficers = this.companyForm.get('officers') as FormArray; this.ep.companyOfficers.forEach(employerRep => { const index = this.getIndexFromTitle(tempOfficers, employerRep.officerRole); console.log(employerRep); if (index > -1) { tempOfficers.at(index).patchValue({ id: employerRep.id, nric: employerRep.nric, salutation: employerRep.salutation, name: employerRep.name, appointment: employerRep.appointment, email: employerRep.email, contactNo: employerRep.contactNo }) } }) console.log(this.companyForm); } getIndexFromTitle(tempOfficers: FormArray, title: string): number { let resIndex = -1; tempOfficers.controls.forEach((c, index) => { if (c.get('officerRole').value === title) { resIndex = index; } }); return resIndex; } }
Company Information (Size: {{ep.companySize}}, eRegistered: {{ep.eRegistered == 'Y' ? "Yes" : "No"}})
- -
NRIC Salutation Name Appointment Email Contact No. {{officer.value.officerRole}}
S/N Date Joined Submitted By Submitted On Date Left Ceased By Ceased On Bank Account. {{i+1}} {{data.value.joinDt}} {{data.value.submittedBy}} {{data.value.submittedDt}} {{data.value.ceasedBy}} {{data.value.ceasedDt}} {{data.value.bankAccount}}
